name: Tales of Granbretan: The Quarry
description:
CONTROLS
WASD - Move
Mouse - Rotate 
Left Click - Simple Attack
1,2,3 - Skills (Level up to obtain)

GAME STORY

In the land of Granbretan, rich noble wizards turned innocent lower-class citizens to monsters.

One of the nobles, Sir Edrick,  was against their plans. After trying to rescue of the quarry, he was caught, and turned into goat-like creature.

You play as Sir Edrick, a noble inheriting dark magic, who was turned into a goat-like creature because he rebelled against the Nobles, is on a journey to save the cursed civilians and have them fight along side him to break the Noble’s Magical Force Field in order to destroy the Noble's Castle.
